mapper.select: SELECT ( SELECT CONCAT( store_name, "(", sub_store_name, ")" ) FROM `store_manage` WHERE id = gcl.store_manage_id AND del_flag = "0" LIMIT 1 ) AS storeName, gcl.serial_number AS serialNumber, gcl.main_picture AS mainPicture, gcl.good_name AS goodName, ( SELECT type_name FROM good_cuisine_type WHERE id = gcl.good_cuisine_type_id ) AS typeName, gcl.shop_info AS shopInfo, gcl.store_manage_id AS storeManageId, gcl.good_cuisine_type_id AS goodCuisineTypeId, gcl.good_describe AS goodDescribe, gcl.video, gcl.details_figure AS detailsFigure, gcl.id, gcl.sort, gcl.frame_status AS frameStatus, gcl.specifications, gcl.specifications_decribes AS specificationsDecribes FROM good_cuisine_list gcl ORDER BY gcl.sort ASC, gcl.create_time DESC
